alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Bibb; Chilton; Dallas; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 1:18AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Autauga, southwestern Chilton, central Perry, southeastern Bibb and northern Dallas Counties through 200 AM CST... At 118 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vaiden, or near Marion, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selma, Valley Grande, Marion, Maplesville, Billingsley, Vida Junction, Vaiden, Parnell, Plecher, Lawley, Paul M Grist State Park, Talladega National Forest, Marion Junction, Burnsville, Potter Station, Randolph, Radford, Stanton, Valley Creek Junction and Plantersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central and south central Alabama.
